title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. title: Rent an Electric Mountain Bike - Hout Bay, Constantia, Camps Bay
text:
Electric Mountain Biking with Cape Lion e-Rides offers the most e-xciting way to get around mountain biking trails this summer - e-MTB! If you are new to e-biking, it's like cycling, but without the grind. 
E-MTBs offer a little more push uphills and little more fun on the downhills. If you haven't tried it yet, what are you waiting for?
Discover the trails of Constantia, Silvermine, Table Mountain National Park and more.  
OUR E-MTBsHard Tail or Full Suspension available

Maximum rider weight, 150 Kg

Minimum age, 14 years old



RENTAL PRICESStarting from R700 per day
WE DELIVER!Hout Bay & surrounds including Camps Bay, CBD, Constantia, Bishopscourt, Newlands and Noordhoek e-bike delivery is FREE. (Noordhoek delivery free, but toll gate charges apply).

With the front wheel and pedals removed it packs down small enough to fit into a regular car boot. Very strong frame, reliable parts, selling as not really using anymore.From website:‘The classic folding mountain bike from Montague, the Paratrooper is tough, rugged, and ready for anything. Its patented folding design was developed under a grant from DARPA to allow airborne soldiers to drop out of airplanes and into combat.The Paratrooper offers 24 speeds, front suspension, mechanical disc brakes, and the RackStand for hauling gear. Tackle any terrain, carry your gear, and fold to stash in your trunk.’

movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase

front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to

choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application

title: 2010 GT Sensor small frame  27.5"(converted)
text:
2 x9 Groupset. 
Tubeless
WTB 27.5" rims

Fork and shock serviced within last 500km
Bike has been used, but in very good condition.
Perfect for a kid who wants to get onto a small frame dual sus bike or for someone who of small stature who wants a dual sus, bit does not want to spend a lot. 

I am personally a big fan of the I drive suspension geometry and have had 0 maintenance needs on this - it is still perfect. Coupled with the Fox fork and shock, it offers a very plush ride. Biggest plus is short, technical climbs. Biggest neg is probably that it is a bit more nervous going down hill (I enjoyed it though) and mud clearance. 

Serious offers will be considered.

title: Yeti Mountain Bike
text:
Yeti’s stiffer, more planted but still agile and pedal-friendly 575 platform is an excellent aggro trail bike. 

Yeti’s agile but confidently authoritative bike has been a favourite all-rounder for ages. It ticks all the right boxes for ripping up any sort of trail. It’s confident enough to use the whole trail and work the most radical angles, but agile enough to avoid what it can’t cope with. It also adds infectious enthusiasm, making it a near-perfect build-your-own aggro trail bike template. 

Ride & handling: Light enough to climb and charge well 

Skinny, loose, zero-tolerance singletrack trails are enough to put any bike and rider on edge.

title: Top of the range aluminium hardtail
text:
Your dream aluminium hardtail. This bike retails for R35900 new and has over R7000 worth of upgrades fitted. It is ready to ride and enjoy. There are no changes between the 2021 & 2022 model year. This is the bike you get after you take it off the showroom floor and make it perfect.
Size Large. Standard specification:
Fox Float Rhythm 32 shock with 3 way lockout. Shimano XT Deore Groupset with 32 tooth chainring up front and 51-10 at the rear.
Shimano hydraulic disk brakes. 
Upgrades: Shimano XT chain (R720) Shimano M520 pedals (R690). Spank Spoon handlebars (R1490). Specialised Body Geometry Seat (R3200). Specialised Body Geometry grips (R530). KCNC twin seatpost clamp. Your seatpost returns to the correct position after you remove it. (R470). One standard Synchros bottle cage and one Synchros bottle cage with integrated tools. To buy this bike brand new (if you can find one) and add these upgrades will cost at least R43000

title: At WOW eBikes we offer quality eBikes at the best value for price and suitable to a wide  range of d
text:
WHY WOW eBIKES? 

WOW eBIKES is about more than
eMobility – it’s about a new lifestyle and a better way of 

life.

 

At WOW eBikes we offer
quality eBikes at the best value for price and suitable to a wide 

range of diverse
applications, ranging from commuter use to recreational and 

commercial use. Using only
tried and tested electric and mechanical components not 

only assure durable and
reliable eBikes, but also a hassle free and enjoyable rider 

experience. We render a
trustworthy after sales service in terms of both service delivery 

and the availability of
spares in order to create a truly WOW customer experience from A 

to Z. 

 

It is the built quality of
the bikes itself as well as the superior quality specifications relating 

to components and group sets
that set WOW eBikes apart from the other off the shelve 

cheap Chinese eBikes
currently offered on many platforms and sold under a multitude of 

brand names.

 

As opposed to these
generic Chinese imports, WOW eBikes offer:

1. All round dual piston calliper
hydraulic disk brakes for better braking.

2. High efficiency 750W
brushless geared rear hub electric motor with reduction ratio 

of 1:5 and 80Nm of ample
torque.

3. Heavy duty 25A controller.

4. Higher capacity 48V
SAMSUNG cells Lithium Ion Battery Pack which does not build 

up memory, gives a longer
range and improves battery life expectancy. 

5. High power charger for
faster battery charging.

6. Double wall alloy rims.

7. Complete single brand
engineered electric system drastically improving reliability 

and durability.

8. Significantly better
quality in terms of upgraded Shimano and SRAM mechanical 

drive train group sets with
wider gear range improving the riding experience as well 

as reliability and durability.

9. 10 Speed trigger shifter
and rear derailleur with clutch mechanism.

10.Availability of spares.

11.Product warranties and
after sales support

 

Contact us on 072 869 0153
Email: info@wowbike.co.za

currently offered on many platforms and sold under a multitude of 

brand names.

 

As opposed to these
generic Chinese imports, WOW eBikes offer:

1. All round dual piston calliper
hydraulic disk brakes for better braking.

2. High efficiency 750W
brushless geared rear hub electric motor with reduction ratio 

of 1:5 and 80Nm of ample
torque.

3. Heavy duty 25A controller.

4. Higher capacity 48V
SAMSUNG cells Lithium Ion Battery Pack which does not build 

up memory, gives a longer
range and improves battery life expectancy. 

5. High power charger for
faster battery charging.

6. Double wall alloy rims.

7. Complete single brand
engineered electric system drastically improving reliability 

and durability.

8. Significantly better
quality in terms of upgraded Shimano and SRAM mechanical 

drive train group sets with
wider gear range improving the riding experience as well 

as reliability and durability.

9. 10 Speed trigger shifter
and rear derailleur with clutch mechanism.

10.Availability of spares.

11.Product warranties and
after sales support

title: POC Kortal MTB helmet - M/L
text: Perfect condition. Worn once - too small for my head.Uranium Black/Light Citrine Orange MattPRODUCT DESCRIPTION_Complete protection for trail and enduro, the Kortal helmet provides lightweight, extended protection and a seamless fit with goggles. With extended protection zones and uninterrupted ventilation, you’ll find safety and comfort wherever you choose to ride, and however hard you push.Certified for use with e-bikes, the helmet passes the Dutch NTA8776 standard, which tests helmets at higher impact speeds than for standard bicycle use. Currently, this is the only standard for e-bike helmets.In a crash, the patented breakaway peak will snap away from the helmet, helping to protect against neck injury.The helmet peak raises high enough on the helmet for goggles to fit underneath while not in use, and no helmet vents are covered by the goggle strap.

title: Mongoose Downhill Boot R
text: Mongoose Downhill Boot R Large  frame Bike in good condition The Mongoose Boot'R 27.5 Dual Suspension Mountain bike is a downhill terrain for a pure riding experience that will give you a thrill. Mongoose built this bike with a Tectonic T2 Aluminium frame which is reliably durable yet lightweight and is equipped with internal cable routing and Free Floating Technology Suspension. The floating Coil Deluxe Rear Shock with 200mm of travel and RockShox Boxxer Fork with 200mm travel form a formidable duo which is extremely capable on intense downhill tracks.When you're rolling with all of that speed the Tektro Slate T4 Hydraulic Disc Brakes will give you the braking power you need to ride with control. The Mongoose Boot'R 27.5 Dual Suspension Mountain bike has the versatility to excel on technical downhill trails and still offer an incredibly capable ride on any trail.

title: COMMERCIAL ETRIKE
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front

loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

significantly.

Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge 

·        
Free delivery in South Africa
